.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlServerConventionSetBuilder extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.Infrastructure.RelationalConventionSetBuilder

summary.para: A builder for building conventions for SQL Server.

The service lifetime is and multiple registrations are allowed. This means that each instance will use its own set of instances of this service. The implementations may depend on other services registered with any lifetime. The implementations do not need to be thread-safe.

Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions, and Accessing SQL Server and SQL Azure databases with EF Core for more information.
